tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE full_size_images (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  thumbnail_id INT,
  image_name VARCHAR(50),
  image_data BYTEA,
  FOREIGN KEY (thumbnail_id) REFERENCES thumbnails(id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserLikes (
    user_id INT,
    image_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES FullSizeImages(id)
);
